name: Thamos Floros
personality: Confident and decisive, but sometimes stubborn
story: Born and raised in a small village in Greece, Thamos Floros enlisted in the military at the age of 18. He quickly impressed his superiors with his leadership abilities and was promoted to the rank of sergeant at the age of 24. Thamos has led his squad through several successful missions and is highly respected by his fellow soldiers. Despite being away from his wife and two children, Thamos remains dedicated to completing his duty and protecting his country.
